title: The new Boards are fantastic
body:
i prefer this, its easier on the eyes, reading both on my PC and my PHONE - the layout is abit different to classic forums but i think its something i will get used to quite quickly.

i like the side panel. i can jump to and from different forusms alot easier.

overall i like it.


Thanks Riot
{{summoner:13}}

replies.body: They are growing on me every day :)
Since Boards (Beta) 's r{{champion:60}} you could say they're growing on everyone.

Well, I needed a new image to go with the new forums (boards). You could ask {{champion:1}} one on the old forums that I was a filthy necromancer. So now I'm dedicating myself to generating helpful and constructive comments and of course, the puns!
I could read this all day.. please carry on :)
{{champion:6}} be patient. If I go to hard {{champion:25}} need a move to {{champion:121}}stan.

WOW! Don't come to Forums for a few months and everything changed!
I really like this, much nicer than the old forums... 
Well done Riot!
I honestly don't like some of the colours. It just doesn't match with my liking. I think there should be a setting which allows you to change the colours on Boards just to your personal liking.

Senior membership T.T Ruined.

P.s. Loving boards.
